word_mean: 打呃，呃逆：膈肌的非随意性痉挛性收缩，先吸气，然后随着声门闭合而突然中止，并发出特殊的声音

sentence.Network_en: A recent sales hiccup is nothing to panic about.
sentence.Network_cn: 用不着为最近销售上出现的一点小问题感到惊慌。

sentence.Network_en: Despite the occasional hiccup, the US and Laos have had quite cordial relations.
sentence.Network_cn: 尽管偶尔出现一些小的磕碰，美国和老挝一直保持着很友好的关系。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 八年级上册英语单词 ... born 出生、出世 hiccup 打嗝 sneeze （打）喷嚏.
常用临床医学英文术语 ... hematemesis 呕血 hiccough， hiccup 打呃，呃逆 nausea 恶心.
呃逆症（hiccup）（Hiccup）是膈肌和肋间肌等辅助呼吸肌的阵挛性不随意挛缩，伴吸气期门突然闭锁，空气迅速流入气管内，发出特异性声音 …
哕字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 哕 yuě 打呃〖 hiccup〗 呕吐。亦指呕吐物〖 vomit〗.

list.abs: 打嗝模式 (Hiccup Mode) 限流保护可调的、固定 1.9V、2.5V、2.8V 和 3.3V 输出全部采用 N 沟道 MOSFET 同步驱动器极佳的输出 …
开关电源... ... 过载保护 Over load protection 105~135%切断输出，自动恢复 105~135%hiccup mode,auto-recovery 序号 No.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: imitative; the form hiccough arose by association with cough

encyclopedia.content: 角色资料 好莱坞电影-《驯龙记》的男主角。 影片资料 《驯龙记》(How to Train Your Dragon) 导演：彼德·哈斯汀斯 克里斯·桑德斯 Chris Sanders 主演：杰伊·巴鲁切尔 Jay Baruchel 杰拉德·巴特勒 Gerard Butler 亚美莉卡·费雷拉 America Ferrera Craig Ferguson 乔纳·希尔 Jonah Hill 克里斯托夫·梅兹-普莱瑟 Christopher Mintz-Plasse 克里斯汀·韦格 Kristen Wiig T.J.米勒 T.J. Miller 类型：动画 奇幻 冒险 家庭 上映

entry.tran: 小问题;（尤指）暂时的耽搁
entry.def: You can refer to a small problem or difficulty as a hiccup, especially if it does not last very long or is easily put right.

example.ex: A recent sales hiccup is nothing to panic about...
example.tran: 用不着为最近销售上出现的一点小问题感到惊慌。

example.ex: Despite the occasional hiccup, the US and Laos have had quite cordial relations.
example.tran: 尽管偶尔出现一些小的磕碰，美国和老挝一直保持着很友好的关系。

entry.def: When you have hiccups, you make repeated sharp sounds in your throat, often because you have been eating or drinking too quickly.

example.ex: A young baby may frequently get a bout of hiccups during or soon after a feed.
example.tran: 小婴儿进食过程中或刚刚进食后经常会打嗝。

entry.def: A hiccup is a sound of the kind that you make when you have hiccups.
When you hiccup, you make repeated sharp sounds in your throat.

example.ex: She was still hiccuping from the egg she had swallowed whole.
example.tran: 刚才一口吞下整个鸡蛋，她现在还在打嗝。

means.word_mean: 1. (usually plural) the state of having reflex spasms of the diaphragm accompanied by a rapid closure of the glottis producing an audible sound; sometimes a symptom of indigestion;
1. breathe spasmodically, and make a sound;

sentences.sentence: "When you have to hiccup, drink a glass of cold water"

auth_sentence.content: It may be a very, extremely transitional hiccup.
auth_sentence.res_content: It may be a very, extremely transitional hiccup.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It may be a very, extremely transitional hiccup.

auth_sentence.content: Does it come out like a hiccup or something?
auth_sentence.res_content: Does it come out like a hiccup or something?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Does it come out like a hiccup or something?

auth_sentence.content: Everyone has a hiccup from time to time.
auth_sentence.res_content: Everyone has a hiccup from time to time.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Everyone has a hiccup from time to time.

sentences.en: I cannot find a rhyme to “hiccups”.
sentences.cn: 我不能找到和hiccups同韵的词。

means.word_mean: 连续地打嗝,一连串的打嗝

sentences.en: You can usually get rid of hiccups by drinking water very quickly.
sentences.cn: 你可以用快速喝水法消除打嗝。

sentences.en: He suddenly had an attack of the hiccups.
I ate too quickly and got hiccups.
sentences.cn: 我吃得太快，结果不停地打嗝。

means.word_mean: 暂时性的小问题；短暂的停顿；小问题；暂时性耽搁

sentences.en: This one defeat was the only hiccup in the team’s steady progress up the League.
sentences.cn: 这次失利只是球队在朝联赛稳步前进的道路上唯一的小挫折。
